title: The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' filters do not work
OB: When creating a new report, the 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' filters do not work as expected. After saving and previewing the report, no data is displayed.
EB: The report should display data according to the 'Top N' and input parameters.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new report. 2. Apply the 'Top N' or 'Bottom N' filters. 3. Save and preview the report. Verify that the data displayed is correct based on the applied filters and input parameters.
